home.title: Sahel AgriConnect
home.subtitle: Mali ani Burkina Faso dugukolo baarakɛcogo digitizali
home.projectDescription: Sahel Dugukolo Yiriwaleya Porozɛ (PTASS) bɛ sɛ ka Mali ani Burkina Faso dugukolo baarakɛcogo digitize ani modernize ka sɔrɔ ka dumuni hakɛ sɔrɔ ani ka baara jamanaw ka ɲɛsin.

foodSovereignty.title: Dumuni Hakɛ
foodSovereignty.description: Ka Mali ani Burkina Faso jama dumuni hakɛ sɔrɔ ka baara kɛ ka dugukolo baarakɛcogo modern ani sustainable ye.

valorization.title: Jamanaw Ka ɲɛsin
valorization.description: Ka dugukolo baara jamanaw ka ɲɛsin ka sɔrɔ ka sɛnɛkɛlaw ani kɔrɔkɛlaw wari kura.

period.title: 2026-2030 Waati
period.description: Duuru san 5 ka Sahel jamana dugukolo baarakɛcogo sustainable yiriwaleya.

priorityCereals.title: Kɛmɛw Ka Fɔlɔ
priorityCereals.description: Jamana baara min bɛ kan ka dumuni hakɛ sɔrɔ

cashCrops.title: Wari Kɛmɛw
cashCrops.description: Jamanaw ka ɲɛsin ani ka bɔ jamana kɔnɔ

standard.title: Kalite Standard
standard.description: Baara min bɛ kan ka jamana ani jamana kɔnɔ mara kalitew ye.

premium.title: Kalite Premium
premium.description: Kalite ka ɲɛ baara ka jamana kɔnɔ mara ani ka bɔ jamana kɔnɔ ka sɔrɔ ka sɛbɛnni ye.

excellence.title: Kalite Excellence
excellence.description: Kalite ka ɲɛ baara ka jamana kɔnɔ bɔ ka sɔrɔ ka sɛbɛnni ani ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ sɔrɔ.

irrigation.title: Ji Kɛli
irrigation.description: Ka ji kɛli sistem modern ani sustainable sɔrɔ ka dugukolo baara ka ɲɛ sɔrɔ ani ka sanji kama kɛnɛya dɔgɔya.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Ka logistique cɛmancɛ ka dugukolo baara jamanaw transport ka baara kɛ ka jamana kɔnɔ mara ani ka jamana kɔnɔ bɔ.

growthPotential.title: Ka ɲɛ Sɔrɔ Potentiel
growthPotential.description: Mali ani Burkina Faso bɛ dugukolo baara potentiel ka ɲɛ bɛ sɔrɔ. Ka teknoloji, infrastructure ani kalanw bɛ sɛ, dugukolo baara bɛ se ka 3 wa 5 ye ka sɔrɔ, ka sɛnɛkɛlaw ani jama jamanaw wari sɔrɔ ka baara kɛ.

cta.title: PTASS Porozɛ ka taa
cta.description: I ka kɛ sɛnɛkɛla, kɔrɔkɛla, wari bɔrɔla walima jɛkulu ye, i ka Sahel dugukolo baarakɛcogo yiriwaleya ka taa.

farmerRegistration.title: Sɛnɛkɛla Kura Sɛbɛnni

fields.family: Sosokɛla (sosokɛla baara, dumuni walima wari dɔgɔ)
fields.transformationConnection: N b'a fɛ ka jamanaw yiriwaleya cɛmancɛ walima muso jɛkulu bɛ kan ka jamanaw ka ɲɛsin.
fields.manureFertilizer: Yɛrɛ bɛ se ka baga jɔnɔ kɛ ka dugukolo baara kɛ?
fields.manureBiogas: Yɛrɛ bɛ se ka baga jɔnɔ kɛ ka ɲɛ (biogas) kɛ?
fields.cooperativeInvestment: I b'a fɛ ka kɔrɔkɛla/processeur la wari kɛ?

errors.required: Aw ka kan ka kunnafoni bɛɛ sɛbɛn
errors.areaInvalid: Dugukolo ka ba juguman (ka kan ka nɔmɔri ye)
errors.cooperativeLink: I ka kɔrɔkɛla bɛ kan fɔ
errors.cooperativeRole: I ka kɔrɔkɛla kɔnɔ ka baara fɔ

farmerRegistration.noLoan: Jɛkuluw bɛɛ ani dɛmɛw bɛɛ tɛ wari dɔn: jamana jamanaw ka baara, kalan fɔlɔ, baga minnu bɛ kan ka kɔrɔkɛlaw ye.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Sɛnɛkɛlaw minnu sɛbɛnnen don platform kɔnɔ ka ɲɛ
dashboard.note: Dashboard ninnu bɛ kunnafoniw jira. Baarakɛcogo laban kɔnɔ, kunnafoniw bɛ se ka kɛ waati kelen na ka platform database ye.

login.title: Admin Jɛkulu
login.subtitle: Sɔrɔli ka kan ka adminw ye

soilDiagnostic.title: Dugukolo Sɛgɛsɛgɛ
soilDiagnostic.subtitle: I ka dugukolo jugumanw sɛgɛsɛgɛ ani ka sɔrɔliw sɔrɔ

diseaseDetection.title: Jiri Bana Sɔrɔli
diseaseDetection.subtitle: Jiri jiri foto tɔgɔ ka bana sɔrɔ

thinkTank.title: Think Tank Sɔrɔliw
thinkTank.subtitle: Sɔrɔliw ani sɔrɔliw ka dugukolo baarakɛcogo sustainable ye
